name: design-verification-primers
title: Design Verification Primers
description: Design Sanger sequencing primers to verify plasmid regions
content:
Overview

This application designs primers for Sanger sequencing to verify specific regions in a plasmid, using existing primers when possible.

Features

  • Uses existing primer library
  • Designs new primers as needed
  • Ensures complete coverage
  • Optimizes for Sanger sequencing

Parameters

  • Plasmid Sequence: Complete plasmid
  • Target Region: Start and end positions
  • Coverage Length: Typical read length
  • Primer Length: For newly designed primers

Output

Returns recommended primers with coverage map showing how each primer covers the target region.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/design_verification_primers.py "${plasmidSequence}" ${start} ${end} ${linear} --coverage-length ${coverageLength} --primer-length ${primerLength} -o "${outputDir}"

spec.name: start
spec.label: Target Region Start
spec.description: Start position of region to verify (0-based)

spec.name: end
spec.label: Target Region End
spec.description: End position of region to verify

spec.name: linear
spec.label: Linear Plasmid
spec.description: Enter '--linear' if plasmid is linear (leave empty for circular)

spec.name: coverageLength
spec.label: Coverage Length
spec.description: Typical Sanger read length in bp

spec.name: outputDir
spec.label: Output Directory
spec.description: Select or create a stash folder where results will be saved
